entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 12 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. High 12 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
